content: this pattern is for your personal use only © mrsrosedesigns1@gmail com christmas bunting sweater the papercut boys and girls pattern repeat is 60 sts wide and 21 row high the tree and house pattern repeat is 20 sts wide and 23 row high shown here with 3 repeats = 60 sts wide the small snowflakes pattern repeat is 15 sts wide and 15 row high shown here with 4 repeats = 60 sts wide mrs rose designs… 6 this pattern is for your personal use only © mrsrosedesigns1@gmail com christmas bunting sweater the nut cracker soldier is 7 sts wide and 25 row high shown here grouped into 2 repeats of 30 sts = 60 sts wide the hearts chart pattern repeat is 60 sts wide and 17 row high this chart s pattern repeat is 12 sts wide and 17 row high shown here with 5 repeats of 12 sts = 60 sts wide mrs rose designs… 7 this pattern is for your personal use only © mrsrosedesigns1@gmail com christmas bunting sweater the christmas bauble chart pattern repeat is 30 sts wide and 23 row high shown here with 2 repeats of 30 sts = 60 sts wide the fading chart pattern repeat is 6 sts wide and 29 row high shown here with 10 repeats = 60 sts wide indicates a purl st and is used here to indicate the 3 row of k1-p1 ribbed band the 3 row of k1-p1 rib plus 26 row of the fading design make 29 row in all mrs rose designs… 8 this pattern is for your personal use only © mrsrosedesigns1@gmail com christmas bunting sweater the baubles chart pattern repeat is 60 sts wide and 19 row high the cross and diamond chart pattern repeat is 60 sts wide and 21 row high the diamond chart pattern repeat is 12 sts wide and 19 row high 5 pattern repeats = 60 sts wide mrs rose designs… 9 this pattern is for your personal use only © mrsrosedesigns1@gmail com
